metadata.title: CVE-2023-27349 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
(BlueZ Audio Profile AVRCP Improper Validation of Array Index Remote Co...)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-27349` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bluetooth - 5.72-0ubuntu5
bluez - 5.72-0ubuntu5
bluez-cups - 5.72-0ubuntu5
bluez-hcidump - 5.72-0ubuntu5
bluez-meshd - 5.72-0ubuntu5
bluez-obexd - 5.72-0ubuntu5
bluez-source - 5.72-0ubuntu5
bluez-test-scripts - 5.72-0ubuntu5
bluez-test-tools - 5.72-0ubuntu5
libbluetooth3 - 5.72-0ubuntu5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bluez package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.72-0ubuntu5').
